author: aldcroft
description:
Registration is now open for SciPy 2012.  If you want to submit an abstract for a talk or poster the deadline is Monday April 30.

http://conference.scipy.org/scipy2012/

SciPy 2012, the eleventh annual Scientific Computing with Python conference, will be held this July 16-21 in Austin, Texas. SciPy is a community dedicated to the advancement of scientific computing through open source Python software for mathematics, science, and engineering. The annual SciPy Conference allows participants from both academic and commercial organizations to showcase their latest projects, learn from skilled users and developers, and collaborate on code development.
title: SciPy 2012
